This band has fallen a long ways since Wages of Sin... I'm disappointed in this release.  Fans, be warned.
these are all remakes of old songs from when Johan Liiva fronted the band.

Good quality rip! The album is a tragic attempt to squeeze more money out of the fans. This is just old songs delivered with a more polished/better sound.

It is a nice "fuck you" to Johan Liiva though. Now his work with Arch Enemy is forever erased!
I think rise of the tyrant is a great album aligard. Good up tho

I don't know why you guys think that this is some sort of attempt to piss off Johan Liiva. They're taking old music and re-recording it with their current frontwoman so that the music's consistent. If you don't like it, don't download it. Simple as that.
